title: no += method for torch.tanh
body_html:
if we run something like

y = y0
y += torch.tanh(x)

where y0, x are Tensors

I would throw the following error:

RuntimeError: one of the variables needed for gradient computation has been modified by an inplace operation

My guess is that this "+=" operation is not properly defined in torch.tanh
because when I change the syntax to y = y+ torch.tanh(x), everything works correctly.

My pytorch version is '0.4.0', python version is 2.7.15
